location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Map Showing Tribes and New Boundary of the Aden Protectorate'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on Paper with Coloured Ink.Dimensions: 460mm x 550mm

mods.abstract: This map shows the British Protectorate of Aden and surrounding area.The boundaries of the Protectorate as well as relevant tribal boundaries are displayed on the map, as well as telegraph lines.
